duties_responsibilities.duty: Collaborate with internal and external stakeholders to create compelling employer branding content related to employee experience, company culture, DEI, wellness, ESG, and recruiting.
Manage content calendar and share content across various platforms (social media, company intranet, event collateral, presentations, ad campaigns, email newsletters).
Evaluate the effectiveness of communication channels and research market trends, best practices, and competitor activity in the social media space.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor’s Degree in Communications, PR, Marketing, Journalism, Business, or Design (Master’s preferred).
